name: Brainjection
description:
Brainjection is a cyberpunk themed puzzle game set in year 2059.
In a world where brain implants have become quite requested as well as strictly regulated, many illegal clinics are available for anyone with enough money in his pocket...

In one of such clinics J.D. and Lez run a lucrative business spending all day modding and upgrading customers brains by means of an AI assisted VR environments, commonly known as Brainjection.

Help them complete the operations in this deep, dark, intense, puzzlegame.
Will they be able to stay out of trouble?

Brainjection is among the winners of the latest Buildbox Game Jam and obtained the 6th place.
